name: Soccer
description:
You're the player in red.
**Where will you aim to get the ball into the goal?**

choices.A: To the left side of the goal
choices.B: To the top right corner of the goal

win.A: You scored! The ball went right past the goalkeeper!
win.B: The goalkeeper jumped to the wrong side, and the ball flew in!
win.C: Survival instinct made the goalkeeper dodge the ball, and you scored!
win.D: The ball bounced off the defender and got in the goal!

lose.A: The goalkeeper jumped out and caught the ball!
lose.B: The goalkeeper kicked the ball away!
lose.C: The ball hit the goalkeeper in the groin, bouncing it out the goal. Despite the immense pain in his scrotum, the goalkeeper let out a relieved laugh.
lose.D: The defender dodged the ball in time, and beat you up.

name: Basketball
description:
You're the guy holding the ball.
**What will you do next?**

choices.A: Launch the ball up to the sky.
choices.B: Raise your arm while holding the ball, and attempt to dunk.
choices.C: Throw the ball to your teammate.
choices.D: Pinch the nipple of the player in yellow who's trying to block you.

win.A: The ball flew up, and went straight down through the hoop!
win.B: You successfully dodged the guy in yellow, and dunked it!
win.C: Your teammate got the ball, and made a three-point shot!
win.D: Your opponent was distracted, and you were able to make the shot uninterrupted!

lose.A: The ball went above and over the backboard.
lose.B: The player in yellow blocked your arm and you missed.
lose.C: The ball went past your short teammate's head and out the court.
lose.D: Your opponent let out an audible moan, causing you to bash his head in with the ball in disgust.

name: Golf
description:
You're about to strike the first shot.
**Which direction?**

win.A: The ball landed precisely in the hole! A hole in one!
win.B: The ball landed on the fairway. Nice shot!
win.C: The ball flew very far and landed on the green!
win.D: The ball landed right next to the hole!

lose.A: The ball went out of bounds and landed on a nearby highway. It got squashed by a truck.
lose.B: The ball landed in the water.
lose.C: The ball landed on the sand!
lose.D: The ball got stuck in a tree!

name: Tennis
description:
You're Michael De Santa.
**Which side of the court to aim and how hard to hit?**

win.A: Your opponent missed the ball! You scored!
win.B: The ball went barely past the net, and your opponent could not hit it on time!
win.C: The ball went between your opponent's legs, and you scored!
win.D: Your opponent was busy staring at birds, so you scored easily!

lose.A: Your opponent striked back harder than you've ever seen! The ball made a hole in your racket and landed behind you!
lose.B: Your ball couldn't get past the net!
lose.C: Your ball flew out the sidelines!
lose.D: You couldn't even hit the ball with the racket!
